Name: BARRAGE / 铁幕
About the game: Tired of 'Pew-Pew' Pistol, Why not try about 40mm Bofors Anti-air Guns, or Mighty 88mm Flak-cannon? 　　Without Aiming and Reloading, There is Only Trigger happy. 　　Welcome to Barrage, 23mm'Shilka'Cannon is the Tiniest Weapon in this game. 　　 　　About This Game: 　　-This is a Simple Shooooooooooooooooting Game. 　　-'Aiming'is not Included in this game.Just be Rambo. 　　-Swiftly Attack/Defence Stance Switch. 　　Four Weapon Unlocked: 　　-ZSU-23-4'Shilka'Autocannon 　　-40mm'Bofors'Cannon 　　-88mm Flak36 Cannon 　　-M48'Chaparral'Missile 　　Face the Combination Attack of: 　　-V-1 Ballistic Missile 　　-V-1 Ballistic Missile 　　-Ju-87 Dive Bomber 　　-Do-17 Medium Bomber 　　-Fritz-X Guided Bomb 　　-Me-264 Heavy Bomber 　　-Ho-229 Jet Fighter. 　　-War Zepplin 　　-Flying Fortress 　　-Armed UFO 　　-Unidentified WunderWaffen 　　Don't make a fuss about shooting WWII Aircraft with Cold War weapons, They are probably used to it.
